description:
My Best Beginner Guitar Lessons Course on Udemy focuses specifically 

on using songs to help you learn how to play 
guitar. After all, what better way to truly 
retain what you learn as a musician than by 
actually getting COMPLETELY "hands-on" in your 
studies? 

Usually when you purchase a guitar training 
course it's all about lessons....lessons....
and more lessons. 
This is a conventional method of teaching, and 
I'm anything but conventional.
  • If you're like me....
  • You love the idea of learning how to play your favorite songs in only minutes - NOT hours.
  • You want to have a variety of songs to play depending on your mood.
  • You want a program that is actually FUN and challenging at the same time. ...my friend - it's ALL possible right here, right now.

This is a TOTAL Immersion Program!

No matter where your current level of playing is at the moment, my Best Beginner Guitar Lessons System on Udemy provides you with a variety of songs to practice. You name it - I've got it: strumming, fingerstyle, EZ lead guitar....and more.

You get to learn while you play, giving you the motivation necessary to fully realize your potential as a musician.

Here at Best Beginner Guitar Lessons you'll learn to:

  • QUICKLY remember chords
  • CHANGE chords easily
  • UNDERSTAND song structure
  • STRUM, sing, and play
  • FINALLY finish a FULL song
  • LEARN chords as you approach them
  • USE simple strum patterns that you can alter
  • PLAY songs through video-based learning
  • and MUCH....MUCH more!
  • So, enough about WHAT Best Beginner Guitar Lessons online program is all about.... Now it's time to sign up and see HOW it works!
title: Best Beginner Guitar Lessons by Sam Lyons
